:orphan:

SynthUSBII
==========

**From:** Windfreak Technologies, LLC

**Class:** :py:class:`herosdevices.hardware.windfreak.SynthUSBII`


**Driver Quality Index:** stable


Windfreak SynthUSB2 RF generator driver.

.. tabs:: 


   .. tab:: Arguments
   
   
      Bold arguments are mandatory.    .. tab:: Example JSON for BOSS
   
      The following JSON strings can be used to start a HERO device representation of             :py:class:`SynthUSBII <herosdevices.hardware.windfreak.SynthUSBII>` using             `BOSS <https://boss-eb4966.gitlab.io/>`_.
      
      
      .. code-block:: json
      
         {
             "_id": "my_SynthUSBII",
             "classname": "herosdevices.hardware.windfreak.SynthUSBII",
             "arguments": {
                 "address": "<class 'str'>",
                 "timeout": 1.0
             }
         }
